dict.acceptation: 灯，灯泡；照射器；（智慧等的）明灯；电子管；

sent.orig: Methods: The specific gene of Bacterium coli O157 was amplified by LAMP, and compared with PCR.
sent.trans: 方法采用环介导的恒温扩增反应(LAMP)技术扩增大肠杆菌O157特异性基因，并与传统PCR比较。

sent.orig: We are mainly deal with all kind of lamp, lamp, wall lamp lamp and ceiling lamp.
sent.trans: 我们只要生产各种台灯、吊灯、壁灯、落地灯与吸顶灯。

sent.orig: The main products are: commercial home-using chandelier, crystal lamp, ceiling lamp lamp, lamp, lamp etc.
sent.trans: 主要产品有：陶瓷系列灯具，家庭用吊灯、吸顶灯、壁灯、水晶灯、台灯、落地灯等。

sent.orig: Shangyu Star-Source Lighting Co Ltd-stainless steel lamp, wall lamp, lawn lamp underwater lamp, solar energy lamp.
sent.trans: 上虞星源灯具有限公司-不锈钢，铜，铝，铁，木制，仿石灯具，草坪灯，壁灯，吸顶灯，庭院灯，太阳能灯。

sent.orig: Equipped with incandescent lamp, mercury vapor lamp, high-pressure sodium vapor lamp, metal halide lamp.
sent.trans: 可配装白炽灯、汞灯、高压钠灯、金卤灯。可按用户要求配装灯伞。
